Related repos

  • Manages ESP32 and ESP8266 boards from a browser
  • Firmware for ESP32 drone telemetry
  • Firmware for quadcopters using Wi-Fi chips
  • backend for ESP32 smart devices, device control and voice features
  • ESP32 audio streaming software suite
  • List of ESLint plugins, configs, parsers, tools, and tutorials
  • Firmware for hardware hacking via serial or web interface
